correspondence.message: I am studying business informatics in my 3rd semester and would like to know whether I can have the courses from UnternehmerTUM, especially 'Principled Entrepreneurial Decisions' and 'Innovation Sprint', credited towards my degree program. Do these credits count as modules from the area of ​​economics or interdisciplinary fundamentals?"
If you take the two courses as part of the project weeks, you can incorporate them into your studies as interdisciplinary foundations.
